TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlProfileProvider extends System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider

summary.span: Manages storage of profile information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

span.span: Manages storage of profile information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 設定檔用來儲存和擷取資料來源，例如資料庫中的使用者設定。The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用存取使用者設定檔屬性與目前。The user profile is accessed using the property of the current . 使用設定檔提供者來管理設定檔資訊和屬性值。Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider. 類別由 ASP.NET 用來儲存和擷取設定檔設定 ASP.NET 應用程式所使用的 SQL Server 資料庫。The class is used by ASP.NET to store and retrieve profile settings for an ASP.NET application that is using a SQL Server database. 若要使用，您必須先建立所使用的 SQL Server 資料庫。To use a , you must first create the SQL Server database used by the . 若要建立所使用的資料庫，執行 aspnet_regsql.exe 工具，其位於 [*磁碟機*:] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\ `2.0versionNumber`資料夾，並指定 **-A p**選項。To create the database used by the , run the aspnet_regsql.exe tool, which is found in the [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\`2.0versionNumber` folder, and specify the **-A p** option. 下列命令示範如何使用可執行 aspnet_regsql.exe:The following command demonstrates how you might use the aspnet_regsql.exe executable: ``` aspnet_regsql.exe -A p ``` 上述範例中不會指定建立時，資料庫的名稱，所以會使用預設名稱。The example above does not specify a name for the database that is created, so the default name will be used. 預設的資料庫名稱是 Aspnetdb。The default database name is Aspnetdb. 機器組態包含預設名為 AspNetSqlProvider，連接到本機電腦上的 SQL Server 執行個體。The machine configuration contains a default instance named AspNetSqlProvider that connects to the SQL Server on the local machine. 您可以使用的提供者，這個執行個體，或指定您自己的 Web.config 檔案中的 ASP.NET 應用程式。You can use this instance of the provider, or specify your own in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 如果設定檔提供者設定為使用整合式的安全性的連接字串，ASP.NET 應用程式的處理序帳戶必須具有連線到 SQL Server 資料庫權限。If the profile provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示設定為使用 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a . ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫建構函式建立的執行個體類別使用的應用程式組態檔中指定的值。ASP.NET calls the constructor to create an instance of the class using the values specified in the configuration file for the application. 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

value.span: 用來儲存和擷取設定檔資訊的應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.
The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性由不同的應用程式相關聯的設定檔資訊。The property is used by the to associate profile information with different applications. 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料庫來儲存使用者資訊而不重複的使用者之間發生衝突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users. 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以藉由指定相同的值中使用相同的使用者資料庫屬性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 屬性可以設定以程式設計的方式，或它的 Web 應用程式使用的組態檔中可以宣告方式設定`applicationName`屬性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果未指定值`applicationName`Web 應用程式組態檔中的屬性則值會用於 ASP.NET 應用程式。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the value is used for ASP.NET applications. 對於非 ASP.NET 應用程式，預設值是不含副檔名的值。For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the value without the file extension. > [!CAUTION] > 因為單一的預設設定檔提供者執行個體用來提供所要求的所有物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入與變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免撰寫程式碼，可讓使用者設定屬性除非必要，否則。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的設定檔資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體和集合屬性值，以`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property value to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源中移除未使用的設定檔資料`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔，與，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`會刪除參數值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted. 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新方法會在交易內進行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到錯誤時，會回復交易，並會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 ASP.NET 網頁，可管理非使用中的設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 按鈕可刪除未存取自指定的日期以配置設定檔變成非使用中的所有設定檔。A button is provided to delete all profiles that have not been accessed since the date specified for considering a profile to be inactive. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/DeleteInactiveProfilescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/DeleteInactiveProfilesvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從指定的應用程式的資料來源刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的設定檔屬性`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 若要刪除的設定檔清單中指定為使用者名稱的字串陣列。The list of profiles to delete is specified as a string array of user names. 如果設定檔屬性和資訊存在於資料來源中的使用者名稱`usernames`參數，就會刪除它們。If profile properties and information exist in the data source for a user name in the `usernames` parameter, they are deleted. 傳回的值可能不同於指定的陣列長度`usernames`。The return value may differ from the length of the specified array of `usernames`. 這表示指定的陣列中的設定檔的一些`usernames`已經從資料存放區刪除。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified array of `usernames` were already deleted from the data store. 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新方法會在交易內進行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到錯誤時，會回復交易，並會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 ASP.NET 網頁，可管理非使用中的設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. A控制項會顯示非作用中傳回的設定檔。A control displays the inactive profiles returned. 每個資料列控制項包含一個按鈕，從資料來源，藉由呼叫刪除該資料列的設定檔方法。Each row of the control includes a button that deletes the profile for that row from the data source with a call to the method. A可以從傳回， ， ，和方法。A can be returned from the , , , and methods. 傳回值，可能會有所不同所提供的值。The return value may differ from the value for the supplied . 這表示在指定的設定檔的一些已導致找不到資料存放區中。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified were no longer found in the data store. 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新方法會在交易內進行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到錯誤時，會回復交易，並會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者使用的設定檔中搜尋和方法。The following code example allows a user to search for profiles using the and methods. 使用者就可以刪除傳回的設定檔，藉由呼叫方法。The user can then delete the returned profiles with a call to the method. summary.span: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time and the user name for the profile matches the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來擷取指定的應用程式的未使用的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 這個方法只會擷取設定檔的使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔`usernameToMatch`參數值。This method will only retrieve profiles for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜尋的設定檔，任何進行程式碼剖析，就會發生在之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`傳回參數的值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 搜尋的相符項目`usernameToMatch`參數值使用`LIKE`關鍵字，並支援萬用字元，例如百分比 （%） 符號。The searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user1"，則會傳回"user1"身分具有使用者名稱的設定檔設定檔資訊，若有的話。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user %"，則會傳回設定檔資訊的使用者名稱的設定檔的"user1"、"user2"，稱為"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"，等等。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. 使用者會傳回其設定檔已加入至資料存放區的順序。Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回的結果; 0 識別的第一頁。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值為 1 具有`pageSize`為 5，傳回包含第 6 到第十個非使用中的設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和和擷取設定檔的任何相符的設定檔的資訊。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 此範例也可讓使用者能夠指定是否要以獨佔方式傳回非現用設定檔。The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果使用者指定僅為非現用設定檔，方法是呼叫; 否則即為呼叫方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/FindProfilesByUserNamecs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/FindProfilesByUserNamevb.aspx#5)]

summary.span: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the specified name.

span.span: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the specified name.

returns.span: A containing user profile information for profiles where the user name matches the supplied parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回一份設定檔的使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔資訊`usernameToMatch`已設定的參數值。The method returns a list of profile information for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value for the configured . 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜尋的相符項目`usernameToMatch`參數值使用`LIKE`關鍵字，並支援萬用字元，例如百分比 （%） 符號。The searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user1"，則會傳回"user1"身分具有使用者名稱的設定檔設定檔資訊，若有的話。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user %"，則會傳回設定檔資訊的使用者名稱的設定檔的"user1"、"user2"，稱為"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"，等等。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. 使用者會傳回其設定檔已加入至資料存放區的順序。Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回的結果; 0 識別的第一頁。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為指定的應用程式的非作用中的使用者設定檔的總數`applicationName`屬性，在組態檔中，根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值為 1 具有`pageSize`為 5，傳回包含第 6 到第十個設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和和擷取設定檔的任何相符的設定檔的資訊。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 此範例也可讓使用者能夠指定是否要以獨佔方式傳回非現用設定檔。The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果使用者指定僅為非現用設定檔，方法是呼叫; 否則即為呼叫方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/FindProfilesByUserNamecs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/FindProfilesByUserNamevb.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來擷取指定的應用程式的未使用的使用者設定檔的資料來源中的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜尋的設定檔，任何進行程式碼剖析，就會發生在之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`傳回參數的值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回的結果; 0 識別的第一頁。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值為 1 具有`pageSize`為 5，傳回包含第 6 到第十個非使用中的設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 ASP.NET 網頁，可管理非使用中的設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 若要刪除所有的非現用設定檔提供的按鈕。A button is provided to delete all inactive profiles. 是否將設定檔視為非使用中時，根據指定的日期`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/DeleteInactiveProfilescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/DeleteInactiveProfilesvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來擷取指定的應用程式的資料來源中的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method is used to retrieve profile information for profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回的結果; 0 識別的第一頁。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值為 1 具有`pageSize`為 5，傳回包含第 6 到第十個設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示所有已設定的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`資料頁面中。The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName` in pages of data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來擷取指定的應用程式的資料來源中的所有未使用的使用者設定檔的計數`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。The method is used to retrieve a count of all of the unused user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜尋設定檔使用的所有設定檔，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值會計算。Of the searched profiles, all profiles with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value are counted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者檢視和刪除根據搜尋準則的作用與非作用中的設定檔資訊。The following code example allows a user to view and delete active and inactive profiles information based on search criteria. 非現用設定檔的計數會顯示使用的結果方法。A count of inactive profiles is displayed using the results of the method. summary.span: Updates the SQL Server profile database with the specified property values.

span.span: Updates the SQL Server profile database with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 ASP.NET 設定檔服務屬性值會設定為目前的要求時，更新 SQL Server 設定檔資料庫。The method is used by ASP.NET profile services to update the SQL Server profile database when property values are set for the current request. 屬性值會設定在指定的應用程式的資料來源`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。Property values are set at the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 設定檔屬性資訊和更新的值做為集合指定物件。Profile property information and values to be updated by the are specified as a collection of objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來修改設定檔屬性值。The following code example uses the method to modify profile property values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/setpropertyvaluescs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/setpropertyvaluesvb.aspx#2)]
